short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Balance the time you spend on YouTube. Never fall prey to distractions again.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you ever spend more time on YouTube than you wish you did but don't want to abandon the platform completely 😅?

We feel you!

With Time BOSS, you now have granular control over what videos you watch.

Here are some of the things you can do:

😎 Block videos from any channel only when needed, keeping them accessible for times when it's okay to relax.
👀 Hide elements you find distracting to avoid temptations.
⌛️ Set daily time limits for videos from any channel or group of channels.
🔥 Only allow videos from specific channels during times when you need to work or study.

🎉 Latest release:
You can now toggle the visibility of distracting elements contextually, directly from YouTube ✨! Give it a try and please share your feedback with us. Hope you like it!
